title: Can AI Bots Unmask Your Wallet? Crypto Privacy at Risk
quickSteps: Always crop screenshots before sending anything to AI or support.
Avoid pasting exact wallet addresses, TX IDs or xpubs into chat.
Ask broad technical questions instead of narrating full routing paths.
Use static guides and documentation for sensitive or high-risk topics.
Separate main wallets from low-risk demo wallets used in examples.

seo.keywords: AI crypto privacy, AI assistants wallet data, chat logs blockchain identity, anonymous crypto swaps, wallet screenshots TX IDs, crypto KYC flows, AI bots on-chain deanonymization
seo.description: AI assistants seem helpful—but they can log wallet addresses, TX IDs and KYC flows. Learn how chat logs can expose your on-chain identity—and how to stay safe.
